answer_description: On 31stDecember, 2005 it was Saturday.Number of odd days from the year 2006 to the year 2009 = (1 + 1 + 2 + 1) = 5 days.On 31stDecember 2009, it was Thursday.Thus, on 1stJan, 2010 it is Friday.
